p: Mosquito sampling between May 7 to August 13, 2017 using 80 Sentinel AGO traps in Reynosa yielded an average of 5.16 (± 0.43 SEM) female Ae. aegypti per AGO per week ( Figure S3). In the LRGV, 30 Sentinel AGO traps during these same weeks yielded an average of 4.16 (± 0.43 SEM) female Ae. aegypti per AGO per week [ 14].
